title: Prey (2017) playthrough -- Part 6
description: What a dope ass game. Will probably play it through again.

fragments.text: like if dime could grow that hair

nice to see a story-driven AAA game with such a long story

though 1 is more "you are a weapon"
so you're expecting the story to be done really soon

that's not just in one store, but in all stores

taking revenge on dahl by recycling his food

(Do not exit out of the credits, this is a Marvel movie ;))

hes going in the recreation center

like "no info, please contact Dr. Drface"
